titles.title: Fair Tax for Repatriation Act
To lower the Federal tax on the earnings of American companies with foreign operations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/11/2014--Introduced. Fair Tax for Repatriation Act - Declares that the federal tax on U.S. corporations earning profits abroad shall be a flat 5%. Makes the Department of the Treasury responsible for administering and enforcing such tax.
